reviews.review_msg: best prof i've ever had. engaging materials & good class dynamic. participate, pay attention & do the readings and the online exams will be a breeze. she listens to your feedback & is willing to make accommodations where needed. weekly/sometimes daily responses aren't hard to do because it's mostly your own opinion- just construct them well

Beth is THE best, but only if you like class discussions. If you aren't a talker, then start being one! It was a small class and I felt like I was friends with everyone. 396 was intersession so it's a lot of work, but actually it's easy (only major items were a midterm + final, both take-home). We get to read books and watch movies for this class!
